nodes.text: The DE-10 blaster pistol was a stylish and reliable  heavy blaster pistol that was manufactured by Antrech Arms, a subsidiary of BlasTech Industries. It was vaunted for its reliability and ease of maintenance, and heavily resembled a slugthrower revolver.

Constructed from high-quality materials, the DE-10 could stand up to immense punishment on the field, and unlike most blaster weapons, it fired a distinctive bright-blue bolt, a feature that was designed simply to set it apart from its competitors. The blaster also costed 1,400 credits.

The DE-10 blaster pistol was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 Collapse of the Republic, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The blaster originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, developed by Sony Online Entertainment.
